page.title: 14MAY AND BAKER
page.content: May and Baker is one of the largest factories in Dagenham.It has branches in 17 other countries as well as many sites in the U.K. The Dagenham site was opened in 1934 and is the headquarters for May and Baker. The company deals in chemicals including Pharmaceuticals, Agrochemicals, Animalhealth products and many other products. The Dagenham branch is especially important for sterile products. May and Baker is a major employer of both men and women in the area, and as a result it is very important in the lives of the people of Dagenham. May and Baker is located in the east of the borough on a piece of land that stretches between Rainham Road South and the District line of the tube.
